PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old widowed white man living in a non-metropolitan area in the northeast region, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he has a high school education and was born in the united states. john identifies as a protestant and is a born-again or evangelical christian who attends religious services once a week. 

politically, john aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views. he is a registered voter and is certain about his registration status at his current address. despite his lower income of less than $30,000 per year, john manages to access the internet about once a day.

john does not participate in any volunteer activities, possibly due to his age or other commitments. overall, he appears to be a devout christian with traditional values and a strong sense of civic duty as a registered voter, despite facing financial constraints in his retirement years.
